event.title: Alex Jones - Angular 4 Fundamentals & Jaycee Cheong - Physical Web
event.description:
Alex Jones - Angular 4 Fundamentals

Introduction into the latest iteration of Google’s Angular Framework. Modules/Components/Routing/HTTP with Observables (services)/Best Practices/Testing.

Jaycee Cheong - Physical Web

Physical Web is an exciting way for us to interact with physical object and to opt in for Physical Web discovery on your mobile device, please follow the instruction on the link(s) below, so you can follow along the demos on Physical Web, Web Bluetooth, and Web Push notification : 

Android: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/6239299?co=GENIE.Platform%3DAndroid&hl=en

iOS: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/6239299?co=GENIE.Platform%3DiOS&hl=en&oco=0
